price: Dhugumatti, Nuti Muusaafi Haaruuniif (kitaaba) adda baasaa, ifnanaafi yaadannoo warra Rabbiin sodaataniif ta’e kenninee jirra.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ وَذِكۡرٗا لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā wahārūna al-fur'qāna waḍiyāan wadhik'ran lil'muttaqīna
